docs.title: 📘 Network Engineer Initial Config Guide
docs.text: Welcome to your network configuration documentation site. Select a topic from the menu to begin.

docs.title: FortiGate
docs.text:
config system global
set hostname FG-Branch01
end

config system interface
edit "mgmt"
set ip 192.168.1.1/24
set allowaccess ping https ssh
next
end

docs.title: Palo Alto
docs.text:
configure
set deviceconfig system hostname PA-Branch01
set deviceconfig system ip-address 192.168.1.1 netmask 255.255.255.0
commit
exit

docs.title: Sophos XG
docs.text: # เข้าผ่าน Web Admin หรือ sfcli

docs.title: 📎 Reference Links
docs.text:
• 🔗 Cisco Config Guide
  • 🔗 Fortinet Documentation
  • 🔗 Juniper TechLibrary
  • 🔗 Ruckus Support Portal
  • 🔗 Palo Alto Live Community

docs.title: Cisco ISR
docs.text:
hostname ISR-Branch01
interface GigabitEthernet0/0
ip address 10.0.0.1 255.255.255.0
no shutdown

docs.title: Cisco Catalyst
docs.text:
hostname SW-Access01
interface vlan1
ip address 192.168.100.2 255.255.255.0
no shutdown

docs.title: Juniper EX
docs.text:
set system host-name ex-branch01
set interfaces vlan unit 0 family inet address 192.168.100.3/24

docs.title: 🔧 Tools & Tips
docs.text:
• 🧪 NetTools: ping, traceroute, nmap, tcpdump
  • 💻 Remote Access: ssh, telnet, console
  • 📊 Routing Table:
  • FortiGate: get router info routing-table all
  • Cisco: show ip route
  • Juniper: show route
